name: PolyPaint AR
description:
Get creative in this AR application! Model simple objects and scan your real-life-drawings to use them in the creation of your own small worlds! Recolor them, move and light them with virtual lights to create the scenes you imagine!

Don't forget to use the Snapshot-Feature to save your favourite creations!


Developed by

  • Jannik Boysen
  • Thilo Brendel
  • My Hoang Phan
  • Finn Kristian Ringhoff

for the Virtual and Augmented Reality course at Flensburg University of Applied Sciences
